name: Modern Arena
description:
It's free competition top down Game. This is Brotherhood version of 'Arena of Ruins' of another Steam store page and Fantasy and Modern style of battle team PvP. There are 1:1 ~ 3:3 modes based on Lan Support. This game has Top down view and mouse click movement. I'll try to do many experimental things and many things about skills can be changed. Feel free to win and show off by conquering the final bosses first.

'Z' key is the interaction key near the two merchants.
